name: collaborative-agentic-platform
description: Collaborative Agentic Platform - Multi-agent development automation

scripts.setup: bun run install:all && bun run db:setup
scripts.install:all: bun run install:ts-backend && bun run install:connector && bun run install:deployment && bun run install:frontend
scripts.db:setup: bun run db:generate && bun run db:push
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts-backend && bun run lint:connector && bun run lint:deployment && bun run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:ts-backend && bun run lint:fix:connector && bun run lint:fix:deployment && bun run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.dev: bunx concurrently --raw --names "TS-BACKEND,CONNECTOR,DEPLOY,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,cyan" --kill-others-on-fail --restart-tries 0 "bun run dev:ts-backend" "bun run dev:connector" "bun run dev:deployment" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:ts-backend: cd backend-typescript && bunx dotenv-cli -e ../.env -- bun src/index.ts
scripts.dev:connector: cd connector-service && bunx dotenv-cli -e ../.env -- sh -c 'PORT=3001 bun src/index.ts'
scripts.dev:deployment: cd deployment-service && bunx dotenv-cli -e ../.env -- sh -c 'PORT=3002 bun src/index.ts'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend-typescript/node_modules connector-service/node_modules deployment-service/node_modules frontend/node_modules logs/*.log
